Container.Name: JellyLooter
Container.Overview: JellyLooter v3.1.0 - Sync media from remote Jellyfin/Emby servers to local storage. NEW in v3.2.0: - External API access (NZB360, Organizr, Home Assistant compatible) - 6 Dashboard layouts (Classic, Compact, Cards, List, Minimal, Large) - Redesigned tabbed Settings UI - Per-server workers (Pro) - download from multiple servers simultaneously - Resource limits (Pro) - CPU threads, process priority, I/O priority - Enhanced download statistics with per-server breakdown FREE Features: - Browse and download from 2 remote servers - Library search - find movies/shows by name - Duplicate detection with local library scanning - Rating overlays on posters (IMDB/TMDB ratings) - Quality badges (4K, 1080p, HDR, Dolby Vision, Atmos) - Content rating badges (PG-13, R, TV-MA) - Time format option (12-hour or 24-hour) - 30+ timezone options - Mobile-friendly responsive UI with hamburger menu - Download history, search/filter, keyboard shortcuts - Auto-retry failed downloads - Multi-language support (English, Spanish, German) PRO Features ($10 lifetime): - Unlimited servers and sync mappings - Per-server workers - each server gets dedicated download pool - Resource limits - control CPU, I/O, memory for NAS/low-power devices - Notifications (Discord, Telegram, 80+ services) - GPU transcoding (NVIDIA NVENC, Intel QuickSync, AMD VAAPI) - Transcoding presets: H.264, H.265/HEVC, AVI, Mobile, 4K Optimized - Transcode cache drive support (use fast SSD) - Download and bandwidth scheduling - *arr integration (Sonarr/Radarr auto-add and folder naming) - Intelligent path mapping auto-detection - Custom themes (Jellyfin, Plex, Emby, Christmas, Custom) - Multiple local servers for duplicate detection - Analytics dashboard Get Pro: https://lightwave43.gumroad.com/l/rmtmrr Confirmed working on Unraid 7.0+ / 7.2.2

Config.Name: Storage Path
Config.Description: Path to your media storage (where downloads will be saved)

Config.Name: Cache Path (Pro)
Config.Description: (Pro) Path to cache drive for faster transcoding - download to cache, transcode, then move to array

Config.Name: Nvidia Visible Devices
Config.Description: (Pro GPU) Set to 'all' or GPU UUID for NVIDIA transcoding. Also add --runtime=nvidia to Extra Parameters.
